LanguageData.BenLubarsVanillaExpandedPatches_forceIte: Forces item processors that only allow one item type to start even if there are zero items of that type on the map.
LanguageData.BenLubarsVanillaExpandedPatches_checkPla: Hide plants that cannot be grown in the planter box from the list of options.
LanguageData.BenLubarsVanillaExpandedPatches_nonViole: Allow pawns incapable of violence to equip tools.
LanguageData.BenLubarsVanillaExpandedPatches_showFish: Shows the number of cells in a fishing zone, so you don't have to manually count.
LanguageData.BenLubarsVanillaExpandedPatches_noRoyalJ: Prevents refugees in Royalty quests from spawning with royal jelly addictions. They can still get addicted to royal jelly by other means (eg. eating it).
LanguageData.BenLubarsVanillaExpandedPatches_autoAllo: Automatically unforbid ores mined by non-human members of your faction.
LanguageData.BenLubarsVanillaExpandedPatches_previewI: Show a preview of the insectoid that will be incubated for the currently selected genomes.
LanguageData.BenLubarsVanillaExpandedPatches_EngageBi: Activate Incubator to create a new {NAME} from the inserted genetic materials.\n\n{DESC}
LanguageData.BenLubarsVanillaExpandedPatches_autoAllo: Automatically unforbid fruit dropped from wild plants (eg. lemon trees).
LanguageData.BenLubarsVanillaExpandedPatches_tofuIsNo: Meals containing tofu consider it a vegetarian ingredient. Does not affect recipes.
